summary: Set in Iraq (but shot in Syria), this is the story of three men who try to leave their impoverished and hopeless lives to get get work in Kuwait. They hire a water-truck driver to transport... See full summary Â»
cast: Mohamed Kheir-Halouani|Abderrahman Alrahy|Abdul Rahman Al Rashi|Bassan Lofti Abou-Ghazala|Bassam Lotfi|Salim Kallas|Thanaa Debsi|Najah Hafeez|Ahmad Addas|Yolande Asmar|Saaduldin Bakdounes|Saadeddine Bakdunes|Adnan Barakat|Ali Elrawas|Laila Ghanem|Youssef Hanna|Saleh Kholoki|Alaa El Din Koksh|Kamar Mortada
title: Al-makhdu'un
